unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Decoding the Data Behind the Likes**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Decoding the Data Behind the Likes**

unnormalised: Chai pe charcha just got an upgrade, folks! Influencer marketing in India is BOOMING, but are those engagement numbers translating to actual sales for your brand? Enter: follower analytics. Think of it as your kundali for social media success.
normalised: Chai pe charcha just got an upgrade, folks! Influencer marketing in India is BOOMING, but are those engagement numbers translating to actual sales for your brand? Enter: follower analytics. Think of it as your kundali for social media success.

unnormalised: Gone are the days of simply counting likes. Now, platforms like GramShakti and Trendify (developed right here in IIT Madras, no less!) are offering super-detailed follower insights. We're talking demographic breakdowns (is your target audience actually from Delhi or mostly Nagpur?), engagement patterns (do they engage more at 7 PM or during the afternoon lull?), and even fake follower detection.
normalised: Gone are the days of simply counting likes. Now, platforms like GramShakti and Trendify (developed right here in I I T Madras, no less!) are offering super-detailed follower insights. We're talking demographic breakdowns (is your target audience actually from Delhi or mostly Nagpur?), engagement patterns (do they engage more at seven P M or during the afternoon lull?), and even fake follower detection.

unnormalised: Imagine: Knowing precisely which influencers in, say, Jaipur, are driving REAL conversions. That’s power!
normalised: Imagine: Knowing precisely which influencers in, say, Jaipur, are driving REAL conversions. That’s power!

unnormalised: Companies are already seeing the benefits. "We increased our campaign ROI by 20% after implementing advanced follower analytics," says Priya Sharma, marketing head at DesiThreads, a Mumbai-based clothing brand.
normalised: Companies are already seeing the benefits. "We increased our campaign R O I by twenty percent after implementing advanced follower analytics," says Priya Sharma, marketing head at DesiThreads, a Mumbai-based clothing brand.

unnormalised: So, ditch the guesswork! Start digging into your data before your next big campaign, especially before Diwali on 12/11/2023. Remember, that viral reel launched at 10:00 hrs on 26/01/1950 could have performed even better with sharper insights! And don't forget to adjust your strategy based on the insights gained before that crucial budget meeting on 15/08/2024. It’s time to get serious about your social strategy!
normalised: So, ditch the guesswork! Start digging into your data before your next big campaign, especially before Diwali on twelfth november two thousand and twenty three. Remember, that viral reel launched at ten hundred hours on twenty sixth january nineteen fifty could have performed even better with sharper insights! And don't forget to adjust your strategy based on the insights gained before that crucial budget meeting on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four. It’s time to get serious about your social strategy!
